message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. It's a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $95?

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $105. It's the lowest I can go and still make a profit.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $98?

I understand that you're really close to your budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $98. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $107. This is my final offer, and I hope you can meet me at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $100?
